input.sentences: ideas were exchanged at the conference .
people broke into smaller groups to share their thoughts .
larger circles contained lectures and demostrations .
the opportunity to meet leaders was given .
pamphlets were given and taken home .
output.sentences: John grabbed a cup of coffee because he knew this would be a boring meeting.
First he had to listen to the leader explain in tedious detail how the group would work
Then all the participants had to tell about themselves as if anyone really cared
But after the sharing circle there was time to chat with other participants.
John ended up signing up for the networking opportunity the following week.
